page.title: 20Local News
page.content:
In this area much local interest is centered around farming.As a rural area it's nature has changed with fewer farm workers and more commuters now living in the villages. With the majority of the area having been built some time ago there are many people very keen to preserve the charm of the village. There are a lot of local clubs and much effort is put into helping maintain the area.Funds are allocated to help run the village hall and church.
Collated and contributed by members of the 1984/5 3rd year(11 & 12 years old) of Holmemead Middle School,Biggleswade Beds.under the direction of Mrs M. Sheldon,Mr J Shearly,Mrs M Jones, Mr. M Rowland-Thomas & Mr A G Besant.
